verbs.description: Many theories [V: have] been floated in an effort to explain why so - called Evangelical “ Christians ” have turned a blind eye to Trump ’s obvious ( and likely continuous ) sexual behavior , whether it comes in the form of harassment and abuse , paying porn stars ...
